items.summary: Fully overwrite `frontend/src/AppV1.jsx` with the exact “Nexus Singularity (Landing Page + SaaS)” code provided by the user (verbatim replacement of the entire file). Do not add features or refactor the provided UI/logic; only apply the minimum mechanical edits required for this repository to compile/run (e.g., missing imports, unresolved identifiers, invalid JSX, duplicate default exports).

Preserve the existing application entry wiring: do not modify `frontend/src/App.tsx` (must remain a thin wrapper rendering `AppV1`) and do not modify any frontend immutable entry files. The app must continue to mount via the existing `frontend/src/main.tsx` wiring.

Keep the implementation frontend-only for now: remove/avoid any backend calls and Internet Identity dependency usage inside the new `AppV1.jsx` implementation (the app should function purely with in-file mock data + localStorage as per the provided code).
